answers.answer: Honestly, as every pregnancy is different, no one can really answer that for you 100%. As long as you are eating healthy and exercising, basically doing everything you can to stay healthy and hydrated, if it happens, it'll happen. Good luck!

question: I had preelampsia & geststional diabetes with my first bby in 2008 ended in emergency csection... i didn't have it with my 2nd bby in 2010 which still ended in emergency csec due to dehydration causing pre term labor. I had both my babies at 36+5. Will i probably have this baby that early to?? What is the chance i will get that sick with this baby??
title: wondering!!!
